detail_desc: Ankle-length, circular skirt in a woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with a zip and button at one side.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Parka in a nylon and cotton weave with a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover fastening. Diagonal front pockets with a flap and press-stud and an adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs. Concealed drawstring at the waist and hem, and a single back vent. Lined.
Double-breasted coat in soft faux fur with notch lapels, dropped shoulders and diagonal welt pockets. Recycled polyester lining.

Biker jacket with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a small decorative flap front pocket and long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Sturdy mesh sandals with a hook and loop fastening at the top and a loop at the back. Scuba fabric lining. Textured insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Set of two spooky shades of peel-off nail polish. 2x5 ml. Easy to remove – no nail polish remover required. The set also includes 40 nail stickers, 16 of which are glow-in-the-dark stickers.
Long cardigan in a soft, loose knit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Cable-knit jumper in a mohair and wool blend with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Loose-fitting, short-sleeved blouse in a textured viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and pleat at the front. Dropped shoulders with decorative gathers, a gathered yoke at the back and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Fine-knit trainer socks with an embroidered motif and elasticated tops.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a grosgrain trim around the top and decorative bow at the front. Canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with sequins, dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button and side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Braided belt and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Dungaree dress in denim with a chest pocket and adjustable straps with press-studs. Seam at the waist with press-studs at the sides, a fake fly, fake front pockets and a real back pocket.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, concealed button placket, flap chest pockets, 3/4-length sleeves and short slits in the sides. Unlined.

Fancy dress set in soft jersey with foil print motifs. Cape with a collar and hook and loop fastening at the top. Unlined. Padded wizard hat with satin lining. Wand in jersey-covered plastic. Length 30 cm.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, concealed zip down the back and long, wide puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Frill-trimmed seam under the bust and a softly draping skirt. Longer at the back. Partly lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Short, boxy-style sports top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a stretch, jacquard-knit panel, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and legs with wide, flared hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Court shoes in imitation leather with pointed toes and round, shiny heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy, block-coloured cotton jersey. Panel with a text print down the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles. Heel 3 cm.
Wide trousers in an airy weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a tie belt at the front. Straight legs with thigh-high slits. Unlined.
Sandals in imitation suede with covered block heels and narrow straps at the top that tie around the ankles. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8 cm.

Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text motif at the top and a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with side pockets. Unlined.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hood with a wrapover front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

Set with a blouse and pair of shorts in an airy cotton weave. Sleeveless, flared blouse with buttons down the front and a yoke with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders. Puff shorts with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, pleats at the top and covered elastication around the hems.
Boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Top in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a collar and rhinestone-decorated buttons at the top. Gently dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a ribbed hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with lace-trimmed asymmetric cuffs, slits in the sides and a lace trim at the hem.
Lightly padded all-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with press-studs down the front that continue down one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Polyester padding.
Leggings in printed jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft rib knit with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Wrapover top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Boxy polo-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.

V-neck playsuit in a crinkled weave with a wrapover front and concealed press-stud at the neckline. Opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Narrow Alice band in fabric-covered metal with an appliqué in the shape of a glittery mistletoe sprig at the top.

Knee-length dress in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing some wool with beaded appliqués at the top on the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Detachable, ribbed tie belt at the waist and gathers in the side seams for best fit.

Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric in a longer style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Rib-knit socks in a soft organic cotton blend.
Knee-length skirt in a spot-print crêpe weave with covered elastication at the waist. Jersey underskirt.
Cardigan in soft, fluffy faux fur with long sleeves and no fasteners. Jersey lining.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and a key pocket in the waistband. Unlined. Regular fit.

Lightly padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets, elastication at the cuffs and reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Fitted vest top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend.
V-neck top in cool satin with lace at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a reflective print and rubber appliqués. Lined hood with an elastic drawstring, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Strapless balconette bras in a soft cotton blend with lace details and underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Silicone trim at the top and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Blouse in satin with a square neckline, seam under the bust and pleated section at the front. Smocking at the back, and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the top and an elasticated seam, smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Lined front.
Canvas trainers with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, and tapered legs.

Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey and lace with lightly padded, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that join at the back. No fasteners.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton. Dress in slightly stretch twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, front and back pockets and press-studs at the sides. Unlined. Jersey top with short sleeves.
Jacket in imitation suede with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
V-neck blouse in softly draping silk with a small stand-up collar, and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Soft velour slippers in the shape of cars. Fabric linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Metal earrings with glass beads and tassels. Length 8 cm.
Set with a top and tiered skirt in soft cotton jersey. Top with short puff sleeves and a print motif on the front. Skirt with an elastic waistband.
Wide cotton jersey T-shirt with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft modal jersey with long sleeves.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Sleeveless V-neck dress in airy denim made from Tencel™ lyocell. Smocking on the shoulders, narrow elasticated seam under the bust with a decorative tie, concealed pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Soft, cable-knit slippers with a decorative bow and pompoms at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with a small, gathered stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front and rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
